body.name: CushZone Seat Cushion Office Car Seat Cushion, Memory Foam Cushion for Office Chair, Car Seat, Airplane, Bleacher Non-Slip Chair Pad, Butt Pillow for Computer Desk, Wheelchair, Driving (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Elegant Design】: This cushion has a simple and elegant design, featuring a solid color pattern that easily blends in with any interior decor. It adds a touch of sophistication to any seating arrangement.
【High-Quality Material】The seat cushion measures 18''x14.2''x3.15'' and has a removable and breathable black mesh cover that provides good air flow, so you don't feel sweaty while sitting.

【Secure Design】The non-slip rubber bottom of the seat allows the cushion to securely stay it in place. Seat is equipped with a handle on the side to carry easily. Removable cover for easy cleaning. Cover is machine washable.

【Fits Most Types of Seats】The seat cushion is suitable for all and matches many kinds of chairs or seats. It provides comfortable support for sedentary people. Whether at home, in the office, in the car, on an airplane, or in a wheelchair. Whether at work or play, the cushion provides a comfortable support for your back and tailbone.

【Perfect Gift for Sedentary 】PeopleMade of pure memory foam, ergonomically designed to conform to your curves, this cushion provides superior comfort and helps relieve muscle fatigue from long periods of sitting. High-quality memory foam rebounds quickly and is not prone to distortion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathable Cover Breathable mesh cover allows air to flow well so you will not feel sweaty. Premium Memory Foam High-quality memory foam can adapt to the memory curve of your body, rebound gradually, and will not collapse. Non-Slip Bottom The special texture & non-slip design ensures that the cushion will not slip off easily on any seat.

Machine Washable The cover of the seat cushion can be machine washed to keep it clean. Portable Built-in handle, reinforced sewing, you can move the cushion at will. Zipper High-quality zipper is very smooth, allowing you to easily open the cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For People Who Weigh Less than 200 Pounds But Good Qualit
reviews.reviewText: This pad is well made, nice looking, and cushions well.It looks durable, and was well packaged, and gives you about a 2 or 3 inch lift.But it's only 17 inches wide. If you are over 200 pounds or have a buttprint of more than 17 inches, you will find this cushion to be noticeably uncomfortable. Like trying to side on a paint bucket, you'll be sagging over both sides. Not comfortable for tubbies like me, but great for everyone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This is tall enough to elevate me to obtain great visibility while driving. Very comfortable, thick cushion with some weight to it and stays on the seat when I exit my vehicle. Other thinner cushions would move or fall out of my car when I would exit. Great purchase at a reasonable price, I'm very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good.
reviews.reviewText: I got two of these after reading the reviews since I’ve been dealing with some bad sciatica recently. Pillows like this truly are expensive! I have one on my desk chair for working during the day, and one in my car. It’s been 2 weeks or so of use, not daily but most days, and most of my pain is gone. I’m almost hesitant to say that because when people say that in reviews, it’s usually too good to be true. And maybe I’ll jinx it! But I think taking the pressure off my tailbone was really instrumental to healing this pain. I’m a heavier person so the cushions seem to “squish” down thin fairly easily, but so far it hasn’t affected the comfort yet. (They don’t seem permanently squished/thinner.) And actually this is probably better for my car, since I drive a Camry and it would be too uncomfortable to be lifted up higher with a thicker cushion. When I get into the car in these cold winter temps, the cushion is almost hard from the cold but it softens quickly after you sit. It does block the heat from the seat heater but the heat in my lower back and relief from tailbone pain/sciatica is worth it. It’s relatively wide too (more than other cushions I’ve nearly bought) so that’s a plus too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got the idea to purchase one for each of my dining room chairs when my brother in law brought his over while we played cards. He left it on the chair when he went home do I say on it …. Well all I can say is game changer !!! I have tried other chair cushions that just did not cut it. I love my Windsor chairs they are beautiful but hard on the back side.. my chairs are black do I ordered the black they look nice hardly noticeable. Now when we sit at table for long card games or meals we are all very comfortable.. I highly recommend oh and I need to mention that they stay in place and the covers are washable ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time ordering this type of item and I’m very happy with it. It bounces right back to its original shape when you’re not sitting on it which is what it should be doing. Myself and my husband both have issues with herniated discs and sciatica… My husband‘s more chronic than my own. This worked perfectly for me on my dining room chairs, and in my car… For my husband, it was too uncomfortable, but again his disk issues are quite severe as he’s had more than one ablation and a disc replacement. I would suggest try it … it may work for you. I am very happy with it, and extremely glad that I decided to buy these. Now I have one for my car and for my dining room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Memory foam cushion
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cushioned seat for my office chair. It started out comfortable but then the memory foam made my lower back hurt worse. It could just be the way I sit, but I kept feeling like I was sliding off my chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My butt bone aches all the time in my car, which is only 2 years old, so I dont think its the spring in the seat... My husbanc says it doesnt bother him...so I got this pillow and it is amazing, instant relief, I drive over 20 minutes to work each day, each way and this seems to work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far, the cushion is holding up really well
